tooltip.relics.scouring_eye.ability.glow: Remembers the last target attacked by the player for %2$s seconds. When the ability is activated, the player is teleported behind the remembered target and the ability goes on cooldown for %1$s seconds.
tooltip.relics.scouring_eye.description: An eye torn from the socket of one of the legendary End monsters. Despite the years passed, it is still alive and searching for a target for its next battle...
tooltip.relics.scouring_eye.leveling_sou: +%1$s XP for each teleportation to a target using the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.vacuum_glove.ability.vacu: Creates an area around the player with a radius of %2$s blocks that slows all targets trying to escape it by %1$s%% at the edge. The slowdown increases the closer a target is to the boundary.
tooltip.relics.vacuum_glove.description: One of the filthiest tools, not wielded by warriors or mages, but by 'butchers'. Its aura liquefies the air around it, hindering both movement and mind.
tooltip.relics.vacuum_glove.leveling_sou: +%1$s XP for every 10 seconds of slowdown from the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.void_bubble.ability.prote: Encases the player's head in a protective bubble, completely eliminating the need for air. The bubble also blocks up to %1$s incoming attacks before exploding, scattering %2$s shards in all directions, each dealing %3$s damage. It then regenerates after %4$s seconds.
tooltip.relics.void_bubble.description: A fragile yet durable device that protects the head, body, and mind all at once.
tooltip.relics.void_bubble.leveling_sour: +%1$s XP for each attack blocked by the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.void_cloak.ability.seismi: Upon the death of the player or their controlled creature, summons a seismic zone at the death location with a radius of %1$s blocks, triggering void runes up to %2$s times, each dealing %3$s damage.
tooltip.relics.void_cloak.ability.void_i: Grants complete immunity to void damage.
tooltip.relics.void_cloak.ability.void_r: Every %1$s seconds, summons a void rune under a random nearby target, dealing %2$s damage.
tooltip.relics.void_cloak.description: A robe belonging to a mage who, according to legend, lived beneath the bedrock of any known world. There he mastered a never-before-seen magic of void runes and defeated a massive End beast, whose eye still roams in search of battle.
tooltip.relics.void_cloak.leveling_sourc: +%1$s XP for each activation of the %2$s ability.
+%1$s XP for each activation of the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.void_vortex_in_bottle.abi: Upon killing a target, summons a void vortex %1$s blocks tall that pulls in nearby targets and goes on cooldown for %3$s seconds. After 5 seconds, the vortex explodes, dealing %2$s damage to all nearby targets. If a weaker or equal vortex is nearby, it absorbs it, growing in size and extending its duration.
tooltip.relics.void_vortex_in_bottle.des: A homework assignment of a student from the infamous magic school where students face deadly trials, capturing lightning, clouds, or vortexes in jars...
tooltip.relics.void_vortex_in_bottle.lev: +%1$s XP for each void vortex created by the %2$s ability.
